text: [Music]
hi my name is alex i'm the director of
business intelligence at the litigation
practice group
the litigation practice group is a law
firm that specializes in resolving
individuals
issues with their debt so we take on
multiple debts it could be medical
credit card debt and our role is to try
to get them out of that problem and get
them to be able to live a debt-free life
customer service is a crucial part of
our business we need to be in a position
where our clients feel
comforted and reassured often they're in
a situation where they have a lot of
stress in their lives
one of the key problems to try to solve
amazing connect was how could we get
more issues resolved without connecting
to an agent we had a lot of clients who
were coming to us really basic questions
and we didn't have a way for them to
answer those questions without speaking
to an agent so we started using amazon
connect in november of 2021 and since
then we've managed to expand it out
massively it's been a really valuable
part of our business we saw an increase
in customer satisfaction
we use amazon connect not just for the
basic phone services but we also use
some additional services like leg spot
and contact lens specifically with
contact lens it's been a really powerful
tool for us our quality insurance agents
can get through more evaluations faster
and also using the sentiment analysis
can help guide them decisions of which
evaluations to choose to
work on and also give additional
feedback to agents which they find
really valuable too
having the ability to scale up and down
was really important to us and one of
the main reasons why we chose aws
